comments.content:
I suspect that Günter Gerhard Lange supervised the digitization of Standard for the PostScript version of Akzidenz Grotesk, as he was only born in 1921, while Standard/Akzidenz was introduced by Berthold in their 1896 catalog. I've found no information about the original designer.   
   
More information about Günter Gerhard Lange can be found at MyFonts.com:   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/Person205.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803103614/http:/www.myfonts.com/Person205.html)   
   
Information about the H. Berthold Foundry:   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/FontFoundry68.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803103614/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontFoundry68.html)   
and   
 [http://www.bertholdtypes.com/home.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803103614/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/home.html)   
   
David
GGL definitely was not the original designer of AG.
